description: Denominators of coefficients in expansion of sqrt(sin(x)/x) (even powers only).
maple: A008992 := n -> denom(coeff(taylor(sqrt(sin(x)/x), x, 2*n+2), x, 2*n)): seq(A008992(n),  n=0..12); # [_Johannes W. Meijer_, Feb 10 2013]
prog: (Sage)len = 12; T = taylor(sqrt(sin(x)/x),x,0,2*len+2)[T.coeff(x,2*n).denominator() for n in (0..len)]# _Peter Luschny_, Dec 13 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
